title: Inscription recording civic accounts
support: Large rectangular block of the local limestone, with some chipping to the edges. The front face is covered with four columns of text, with a rough, raised border between the second and third columns.

layout.p: Text is laid out over four columns, with vacats below columns 1 and 2.

provenanceFound._: Found in re-use in during the excavation of the Roman baths close to the upper agora of ancient Tauromenium

provenanceObserved._: None, but block observed and photographed in 2009.
